info.description: A little simpler than some of my other KoL themes. Dark blue colors, easier on the eyes.
info.additionalInfo:
The chat colors are not finished... Leave me a message (kmail) in-game* to request a change or addition to this style.


*Why? Because very few KoL players have (or want to make) an account at UserStyles.org - it should be simpler this way.
